PipelineBiomart.py - utility tasks for importing data from biomart¶

In order to find out about datasets, filters and attributes, use the

listDatasets( mart ) listFilters( mart ) listAttributes( mart )

functions.

PipelineBiomart.importFromBiomart(outfile, columns, biomart='ensembl', dataset='hsapiens_gene_ensembl', host='www.biomart.org')¶

download a dataset from biomart and output as a tab-separated table.

columns is a dictionary mapping biomart columns to columns in the output tables. biomart and dataset denote the database and dataset to get the data from.

PipelineBiomart.biomart_iterator(columns, biomart='ensembl', dataset='hsapiens_gene_ensembl', host='www.biomart.org')¶

download a dataset from biomart and output as a tab-separated table.

columns is a list with field to obtain.

biomart and dataset denote the database and dataset to get the data from.

returns a iterator over rows.
